text: Pauline Viardot (18 July 1821 â€“ 18 May 1910) was a 19-century French mezzo- soprano of Spanish descent. She also taught and composed. She was instrumental in getting Camille Saint-Saens's Samson and Delilah composed and staged. Category:French opera singers Category:1821 births Category:1910 deaths Category:French singers
title: Pauline Viardot
